20-033EC.summary: Recommendation to conduct a study session to interview and evaluate applicants from Council Districts 1, 2, 3, and 4 for the Independent Redistricting Commission, with final recommendations to be presented at the October 14, 2020 meeting of the Ethics Commission.Page 1 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 2:00 PMWEDNESDAY, OCTOBER 7, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESChair Wise spoke.Eric Oates spoke.Porfirio Remigio Arroyo spoke.Oscar Morales spoke.Perkins Drake spoke.Genna Beckenhaupt spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke on behalf of Michael Buitron.Ryan Giffen spoke.Jessica Ponce spoke.Milton Smith spoke.Chair Wise declared a recess at 3:22 p.m.Chair Wise called the meeting back to order at 3:46 p.m.Chair Wise spoke.Josias Gonzalez spoke.Andrew Hale spoke.Dave Shukla spoke.Chair Wise declared a recess at 4:03 p.m.Chair Wise called the meeting back to order at 4:27 p.m.Chair Wise spoke.Andrea Antony spoke.Daniel Fredericks spoke.Page 2 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 2:00 PMWEDNESDAY, OCTOBER 7, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESMauro Varela Jr. spoke.Peter Hanink spoke.This EC-Agenda Item was received and filed.2.
